title: गलत दावा: मतदाता सूची में नाम न हो तो वोटर ‘चैलेंज वोट’ की मांग कर सकता है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: If your name is NOT in the voter list (for whatever reason), you cannot do anything. That’s why you have to check your voter list in advance. If your name is in the list but your vote has been cast, then tendered vote. EC can order repol if it notices any serious breaches. https://t.co/gnSWasfDds
